Snapshot About Me

Good people bring out the good in people

Never let the fear of striking out get in your way

Give yourself a little 'me' time everyday

Be honest, caring and compassionate

Make stuff. What stuff? Anything!

Dogs ARE man's best friend

Strive for balance

Boardgames are cool. Ignore anyone who says otherwise!

Education Related Projects

Learn A Little Python Curriculum View

I've started to put together a beginner Python coding curriculum. This is an opportunity to for me to break down the skills and knowledge required to get an solid basic foundation and reflect further on how this might best be taught to students.

Curricular Links View

This is a collection of coding activities that connect to various subject areas. They are currently mainly focused on mathematics but I hope to continue to add and grow the diversity of examples provided.

Who am I as a creator?

Coding & Education

Curricular Links View

This is a collection of coding activities that connect to various subject areas. They are currently mainly focused on mathematics but I hope to continue to add and grow the diversity of examples provided.

Learn A Little Python Curriculum View

I've started to put together a beginner Python coding curriculum. This is an opportunity to for me to break down the skills and knowledge required to get an solid basic foundation and reflect further on how this might best be taught to students.

Why Learn Coding? Game View

For my Google Innovator application, I decided to create a memory-style video game that introduces several of the reasons that I think it is valuable to learn coding.

Course Website View

This is my course website where I share many of the resources that I use within my mathematics. I've written a blog post here that discusses some of my reasons for creating this.

Photography Projects

Photography Fundraising Project

I started a photography fundraising project my previous schools that went on to raise ~40k dollars over three years.

Wedding & Family Photography Business

Gained experience photographing weddings and families from 2012 - 2015.

My 365 Project

This web application was built to show a gallery of my personal 'photograph a day project'.
